about_the_game:
About the Game

Welcome to the whimsical world of Donuts! Dive into a delightful merge adventure where your mission is simple yet endlessly entertaining: merge on Donuts!

Every 3 hours and 18 hours, a surprise Donut will appear, ready to join your vibrant collection. Can you gather them all?

Features:

A Bounty of Donuts: Discover a diverse array of quirky Donuts, each with its own unique charm.
Collectible Items: Find special items to enhance and grow your Donut collection.
Merge System: Combine Donuts to unlock new and exciting variations, increasing their value and rarity.
Achievement: Unlock a unique achievement as you expand your Donut empire.
Endless Fun: With so much to explore and collect, the fun never stops in the world of Donuts!

Get ready to collect, merge, and build your way to Donut greatness!

name: Merge Donut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Merge Donut is a delightful clicker game where you click on Donuts! Every 3 and 18 hours, receive a surprise Donut to grow your vibrant collection. Can you gather them all?
